评论概述: good shirt , but really runs small
评论详情: It's so impossible nowadays to know how a shirt will run...some are HUGE at this size, and some are way too small.  Size charts don't seem adequate or correct. Maybe Amazon can look into this?

I love the message. I was hoping for better quality. The shirt itself is of lesser quality, and the screen print doesn't look centered. However, it could be just how it fits me personally. Regardless, I still will enjoy wearing it to spark conversation.
